content.question: ​The function <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math> models the population of rabbits on a farm and is given by <math alttext="P open parentheses t close parentheses equals fraction numerator 200 t over denominator 1 plus 5 t end fraction"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>200</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></math> for <math alttext="t greater or equal than 0"><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, where <math alttext="t"><mi>t</mi></math> is measured in months since the start of the year. Which of the following describes the population of the rabbits as time increases?

choices.label: ​The population decreases and approaches a value of <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> rabbits.
​The population increases and approaches a value of <math alttext="40"><mn>40</mn></math> rabbits.
​The population increases and approaches a value of <math alttext="200"><mn>200</mn></math> rabbits.

content.answer: ​The population increases and approaches a value of <math alttext="40"><mn>40</mn></math> rabbits.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
